metatags.twitter:creator: @Reuters
metatags.og:description: A string of organizational flaws during the visit of Pope Francis to Brazil that put him at risk and stranded thousands of visiting faithful has deepened concern about the country's ability to host the upcoming World Cup and Olympic Games.
metatags.author: Paulo Prada, Anthony Boadle

metatags.og:title: Images: The Pope at the Beach
metatags.og:description: Argentina and Brazil are traditional rivals and there was a time when their antagonism was being compared to India-Pakistan relations. They have overcome to a great extent their history of hostility. That an Argentinean Pope was so warmly embraced in Brazil shows that his great office does transcend such divides, notes B S Prakash, India's former ambassador to Brazil.

metatags.twitter:title: Pope's Visit: A Bumpy Test Run For Rio's World Cup, Olympics
metatags.og:title: Pope's Visit: A Bumpy Test Run For Rio's World Cup, Olympics
metatags.og:description: The visit by Pope Francis was marred by security lapses, traffic chaos and other logistical snafus. The event, World Youth Day, was seen as a test for Rio, which hosts the World Cup next year and the summer Olympics in 2016.
metatags.cxenseparse:author: Lulu Garcia-Navarro
